components.description: A large articulated lorry consisting of a tractor and a trailer connected by a pivoted bar. Most likely hauling stock for different companies and services, such as the items on sale within department stores.
components.title: Articulated Lorry

description: A large articulated lorry consisting of a tractor and a trailer connected by a pivoted bar. Most likely hauling stock for different companies and services, such as the items on sale within department stores.
title: Articulated Lorry

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.definition: Articulated Lorry was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015. Copy and paste this emoji: Copy http://emojipedia.org/articulated-lorry/
emoji_net_data.name: articulated lorry

bn:00088912v: Change location; move, travel, or proceed, also metaphorically
To change (from one value to another).
To move or travel (from one location to another).
To change the location of an object.
To transfer a file from one location to another. After the file is transferred, there is only one copy of the file, in the new location.
To move an object one pixel at a time.

bn:00084790v: To move or pass from one place, person or thing to another.
To move persons from one place to another.
To send or convey something from one person, place or thing to another.
To move data from one location to another.
To send or convey from someone, some place or something to another.
Send from one person or place to another
To carry or bear from one place to another; to remove; to convey.
To send information over a communications line or a circuit.

bn:00078004n: A facility consisting of the means and equipment necessary for the movement of passengers or goods
Shared passenger transport service which is available for use by the general public
The act or the means of conveying people in mass as opposed to conveyance in private vehicles.
Any form of transport that can be used by a member of public (usually for a fee); as opposed to private ownership of e.g. cars.

Public transport is a shared passenger transport service which is available for use by the general public, as distinct from modes such as taxicab, carpooling or hired buses which are not shared by strangers without private arrangement.
The conveyance of people or goods from one place to another, especially on a public transportation system; the vehicles used for such conveyance.
The conveyance of people or goods from one place to another.

bn:00056059n: Heavy goods vehicle (a UK lorry - truck - weighing more than 3.5 tons)
A truck or lorry is a motor vehicle designed to transport cargo.
A motor vehicle for transporting goods; a truck.
A large motor vehicle of more than 3,500 kilograms designed for carrying cargo.
An automotive vehicle suitable for hauling

bn:00006135n: A truck and trailer, i.e., a combination involving a semi-trailer (US semi-trailer truck).
A truck consisting of a tractor and trailer together
A big rig truck: a semi-trailer plus the truck or tractor pulling it.
A large truck such as a semi-tractor.

A semi-trailer truck is a large vehicle that consists of a towing engine, known as a tractor in the United States and truck in many other places, attached to one or more semi-trailers to carry freight.
A large truck consisting of an engine and cab section (the tractor) and a cargo carrying semi-trailer or trailer.

bn:00079675n: A conveyance; a device for carrying or transporting substances, objects or individuals.
A vehicle that travels primarily on land in contact with the surface.
A vehicle is a mobile machine that transports passengers or cargo.
Any conveyance in or by which people or objects are transported.
A conveyance that transports people or objects
Mobile machine that can transport people and cargo
